product_name: Vapur Element Water Bottle - 32 fl. oz.
long_description: Weighing only 1.4 oz., the Vapur Element 32 fl. oz. water bottle is about 1/4 the weight of a 32 fl. oz. hard-plastic water bottle and it folds down when empty to take up little space in your pack.
short_description: Weighing only 1.4 oz., the Vapur Element 32 fl. oz. water bottle is about 1/4 the weight of a 32 fl. oz. hard-plastic water bottle and it folds down when empty to take up little space in your pack.
